text: Daniela Bianchi (born 31 January 1942) is an Italian former actress, model and beauty pageant titleholder who had a successful Hollywood career. She was crowned Miss Universo Italia in 1960. She represented her country at Miss Universe 1960 where she placed 1st Runner-Up. She is best known for the role of Bond girl Tatiana Romanova in the 1963 movie From Russia with Love. ==Bond girl== In 1963, she starred as Bond girl Tatiana Romanova, a Soviet cipher clerk sent to trap James Bond in the 1963 movie From Russia with Love. Her voice in From Russia with Love was dubbed by Barbara Jefford because of Bianchi's heavy accent. In another movie she was in, O.K. Connery, was a James Bond spoof movie. Bianchi was again dubbed and it starred Sean Connery's brother, Neil Connery. In 2012, Bianchi appeared in a small role in the documentary film We're Nothing Like James Bond. ==Personal life== Bianchi was born in Rome, Italy. She married businessman Alberto Cameli. They have one son. Her husband died in 2018. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Italian models Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Actors from Rome Category:Beauty pageant winners Category:Bond girls
title: Daniela Bianchi
